ci_support_linux_64_channel_sourcesconda:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,conda-forge/label/python_rc
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libboost_python_devel:
- '1.88'
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.14.* *_cp314
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.summary: Bindings between Numpy and Eigen using Boost.Python

name: eigenpy

about.summary: Bindings between Numpy and Eigen using Boost.Python
Bindings between Numpy and Eigen using Boost.Python

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: eigenpy
  version: "3.12.0"
  build_num: 0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/stack-of-tasks/${{ name }}/releases/download/v${{ version }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e6b7f17e1b7fb61e52447ceee8f47c3fc2c8f9cc4d19317e0467dc71babdb350

build:
  number: 1

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
    - cmake
    - ninja
    - git
    - if: win
      then: clang # use clang-cl on windows
  host:
    - eigen
    - libboost-python-devel
      # On Windows, Numpy 2.0 don't allow to export the PY_ARRAY_UNIQUE_SYMBOL.
      # This has been fixed in Numpy 2.1.
    - if: win and match(python, ">=3.10")
      then: numpy >=2.1
      # Unfortunatly, Numpy 2.1 is not distributed with Python 3.9.
      # We are forced to use Numpy 1 in this case.
    - if: win and match(python, "<3.10")
      then: numpy >=1.19,<2
    - if: not win
      then: numpy
    - python
    - scipy
  run:
    - eigen
    - libboost-python-devel
    - if: win and match(python, ">=3.10")
      then: numpy >=2.1
    - if: win and match(python, "<3.10")
      then: ${{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
    - python
    - scipy
  run_exports:
    - ${{ pin_subpackage(name, upper_bound='x.x.x') }}

tests:
  - script:
      - pkg-config --modversion eigenpy
    requirements:
      run:
        - pkg-config
        - libboost-python-devel
  - python:
      imports:
        - eigenpy

about:
  homepage: http://github.com/stack-of-tasks/eigenpy
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Bindings between Numpy and Eigen using Boost.Python
  repository: https://github.com/stack-of-tasks/eigenpy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ManifoldFR
    - jorisv
    - jcarpent
    - wolfv
    - seanyen

about.summary: Bindings between Numpy and Eigen using Boost.Python
